title: Topic 001 Question 050
body: You have an Azure Databricks workspace named workspace1 in the Standard pricing tier. Workspace1 contains an all-purpose cluster named cluster1.
You need to reduce the time it takes for cluster1 to start and scale up. The solution must minimize costs.
options: Configure a global init script for workspace1.
Create a cluster policy in workspace1.
Upgrade workspace1 to the Premium pricing tier.
